divs: Sighting Detailsi was at my foster parents house at nite,got up to go to the rest room came back into room and therew looking n2 the window was a creature with brite red eyes adblack scaley skin.i jumped into my bed and the creature came thru the wall and crawled into my bed.i felt its skin.i mentally yelled for it to go away and it did.yearrs later in 1989 i recieved call fromm my brother.in miss.he told me he saw it come thru the wall.i told my foster parents about it and they did not believe. i know what i THOUGHT I SAW WAS REAL.i have since seen a black figure near me but only for seconds.ok thanks for reading this who ever you are.at lease i told my story
trends: There have been no other sightings in Oklahoma City
This sighting has never been favorited.
